meanings.definition: A person who is a member of the same band as another.
meanings.sent1: My bandmate plays the drums very well.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy performing with my bandmate on stage.
meanings.sent3: When my bandmate forgot his guitar at home, we had to improvise with a ukulele.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, a bandmate is like a musical sibling.
meanings.sent5: The bond between bandmates is crucial for a successful performance.

meanings.definition: A member of a musical group.
meanings.sent1: Our bandmate is a talented singer.
meanings.sent2: The bandmate plays the keyboard beautifully.
meanings.sent3: During practice, our bandmate accidentally hit the wrong note and made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The bandmate's harmonies blend seamlessly with the rest of the group.
meanings.sent5: Every bandmate brings a unique sound to the music they create together.
